post:
Hi everyone,

Continuing on the success of our [LowEndBox offer](http://lowendbox.com/blog/quickpacket-49month-dual-xeon-l5420-16gb-ram-1tb-hard-drive-in-atlanta/) from earlier this year, QuickPacket is pleased to offer our Dual Xeon L5420 out of 55 Marietta St NW in Atlanta, GA - now including 20 TB Bandwidth on 1 Gbps Port!  We've also reduced our IP address prices to make them more friendly to VPS providers.

**Dell CS24-SC - Intel Dual Xeon L5420**

- Dual Quad Core 2.5 GHz / 2x 12 MB Cache

- 16 GB RAM

- 1 TB Serial ATA Hard Drive

- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS

- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI (uses 1 IP address)

- 20 TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 

- Unmanaged

- Located in 55 Marietta / Atlanta, GA


$49 per month - [Click here to Order Now!](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=100&promocode=LEBXEON) (Coupon Code **LEBXEON**)

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Network providers include nLayer and Cogent (AS46261).
- Ping/traceroute to 199.101.96.2. Please [contact us](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2) for a test file link.
- Please review our [Terms of Service](http://www.quickpacket.com/tos.html) prior to ordering.
- We accept VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover and PayPal payments.
